summary: Retextured Hentai\'s Jamella Armor with Skirt to resemble Erza Scarlet\'s Heart Kreuz Armor from Fairy Tail.
descriptionHtml:
Hi,  I been working on creating an character that resemble Erza Scarlet from Fairy Tail.  I really wanted some of the Armors she equip.   For those who are not familiar with Fairy Tail, it\'s an Anime with an interesting story line; and Erza Scarlet is one of the main character - check out http://fairytial.wikia.com if you are interested.

When I saw \'Jamella Armor with Skirt\' (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8859) it reminded me of Erza\'s default \'Heart Kruez Armor\' (HKA).  So, I took the liberty of retexturing Hentai\'s Jamella armor to resemble Erza\'s HKA .. hope he don\'t mind (Kudo to him for converting those beautiful armors from Oblivion!).   

I hope someone who has more skill than me will take up the challenge in creating some of the amazing armors that Erza equipped in Fairy Tail.  

Enjoy.


INSTALLATION
============
To install, just copy over the texture files in Hentai\'s Jammella Armor with Skirt.
There\'s not mesh in this package so you need to install Jamella Armor with Skirt first!!!

REQUIRED MOD
============
Hentai\'s Jamella Armor with Skirt (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8859)
author: rounin3
